src:
AP Top Science News at 1:02 a.m. EDT
01 Nov 2019, 04:00 by EndPlay
3-2-1-Cookoff! Astronauts to bake cookies with new test oven
Spain offers Madrid as host of December UN climate summit
Greta Thunberg joins LA protest of oil drilling
Measles saps kids' ability to fight other germs
German court throws out climate challenge to Merkel govt
Hundreds of koalas feared dead in Australian wildfires
Science Says: How daylight saving time affects health
Activist Thunberg declines climate prize, urges more action
Dutch construction workers protest environmental rules
Swiss lament glacier melting as UN focuses on mountains
